name: Space Time!
description:
Simple but super fun 2-4 player space battle game. Try and blast each other. Supports  joypad.

LS = Rotate towards direction

A = Thruster

X = Charge and fire Plasma Torpedo

B + LS= Directional thrusters

LT + LS = Rapid blaster

Y = Drop Mine

Hope you enjoy it. Feel free to leave comments, or more likely requests for expansion and features.

Music is "Happy Birthday Bitch!" By the ruiners.
